text: (he musalamaano!) tum sab kaho ki ham allaah par eemaan laaye tatha usapar jo (quraan) hamaaree or utaara gaya aur usapar jo ibraaheem, ismaeel, ishî€¼aaq, yaaqoob tatha unakee santaan kee or utaara gaya aur jo moosa tatha eesa ko diya gaya tatha jo doosare nabiyon ko, unake paalanahaar kee or se diya gaya. ham inamen se kisee ke beech antar nahin karate aur ham usee ke aagyaakaaree hain
